variations.description: Heals all allies for 120% of Yothaya's ATK and reduces damage taken by all allies by 30% of Yothaya's ATK for 5s.
Heals all allies for 140% of Yothaya's ATK and reduces damage taken by all allies by 35% of Yothaya's ATK for 5s.
Heals all allies for 160% of Yothaya's ATK and reduces damage taken by all allies by 40% of Yothaya's ATK for 5s.
Heals all allies for 180% of Yothaya's ATK and reduces damage taken by all allies by 45% of Yothaya's ATK for 5s.
Heals all allies for 200% of Yothaya's ATK and reduces damage taken by all allies by 50% of Yothaya's ATK for 5s.
Heals the front ally for 300% of Yothaya's ATK and increases the ally's ATK by 30% of Yothaya's ATK for 10s.
Heals the front ally for 350% of Yothaya's ATK and increases the ally's ATK by 35% of Yothaya's ATK for 10s.
Heals the front ally for 400% of Yothaya's ATK and increases the ally's ATK by 40% of Yothaya's ATK for 10s.
Heals the front ally for 450% of Yothaya's ATK and increases the ally's ATK by 45% of Yothaya's ATK for 10s.
Heals the front ally for 500% of Yothaya's ATK and increases the ally's ATK by 50% of Yothaya's ATK for 10s.
Heals the Doll with the lowest Health for 50% of Yothaya's ATK every 5 seconds.
Heals the Doll with the lowest Health for 100% of Yothaya's ATK every 5 seconds.
